scripts.dev: npm run generate-guides-json && npm run generate-mdx && npm run generate-groups && astro dev
scripts.start: npm run generate-guides-json && npm run generate-mdx && npm run generate-groups && astro dev
scripts.build: npm run generate-guides-json && npm run generate-mdx && npm run generate-groups && astro build
scripts.check-links: SET CHECK_LINKS=true && npm run build && SET CHECK_LINKS=false
